Posts.Content: heybella wrote: I'm BRCA1 and had a bilateral mastectomy 3 months ago because 5 cm of DCIS was found. Turns out, pathology found a 1.5 cm tumour in there too. ER/PR+ Â Her - ; no nodes involved. I'm now (anxiously) waiting for oncotype results but wondering if any of you had tumours that looked like they would generate a low oncotype score but ended up with chemotherapy becuase of the BRCA1? Dx 9/2012, IDC, 1cm, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 11/1/2012 Mastectomy: Left, Right Hormonal Therapy 2/6/2013 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: BRCA1 and Oncotype test heybella BilateralBeauties
